name: Fresh Factory
headline: Smart Cold Chain Fulfillment Platform
description:
We are transforming eCommerce and Direct-to-Retail fulfillment for Businesses that sells Cold Chain products. 
Fresh Factory provides network of hyperlocal cold chain fulfillment centers, transportation, and equipped them with smart fulfillment management system that allows businesses to store, pick & pack, and deliver their products their consumers faster, better, and more efficient.

founders.name: Larry Ridwan, Founder
founders.description:
Acta non verba !
- 20 years of job experience with verifiable year-after-year success
- Recepeint of Indonesia's medal of honor for Contributing in the National Development
- A proud father of 3 impressive kids and a husband of 1 very supporting wife

founders.name: Widijastoro Nugroho, Founder
founders.description:
Never too late to start.., donâ€™t start too late.. 

25 years of working experience. 

Worked in Unilever Indonesia and UBF Italia SRL, managing ice cream and Frozen products for HoReCa

Launch AirAsia in Indonesia, starting with 2 planes, expand AirAsia Indonesia up to 24 New AirBus A320

Worked in GroupM part of WPP, as Media Trading Head managing USD 350Mn of media buying for global clients such as Unilever, Nestle, XL Axiata, GSK and many more

founders.name: Andre Septiano, Founder
founders.description: Oppourtunist, business enthusiasts, and always hungry of new things.

![Growing Your Business Quickly](https://freshfactory.id/media/public/banners/growing-your-business-quickly-desktop-26082024-022409.jpg)
## Growing Your Business Quickly
Simpan, Kemas dan Kirim semua produk segar Anda ke manapun dengan jaringan fasilitas cold storage kami yang terus bertambah di seluruh Indonesia.
![COLD STORAGE FOR COOL BUSINESS](https://freshfactory.id/media/public/banners/cold-storage-for-cool-business-desktop-26082024-022329.jpg)
## COLD STORAGE FOR COOL BUSINESS
Simpan, Kemas dan Kirim semua produk segar Anda ke manapun dengan jaringan fasilitas cold storage kami yang terus bertambah di seluruh Indonesia.
[Tentang Kami](http://freshfactory.id/</tentang-kami>)[Hubungi Kami](http://freshfactory.id/</hubungi-kami>)
![Growing Your Business Quickly](https://freshfactory.id/media/public/banners/growing-your-business-quickly-desktop-26082024-022409.jpg)
## Growing Your Business Quickly
Simpan, Kemas dan Kirim semua produk segar Anda ke manapun dengan jaringan fasilitas cold storage kami yang terus bertambah di seluruh Indonesia.
![COLD STORAGE FOR COOL BUSINESS](https://freshfactory.id/media/public/banners/cold-storage-for-cool-business-desktop-26082024-022329.jpg)
## COLD STORAGE FOR COOL BUSINESS
Simpan, Kemas dan Kirim semua produk segar Anda ke manapun dengan jaringan fasilitas cold storage kami yang terus bertambah di seluruh Indonesia.
[Tentang Kami](http://freshfactory.id/</tentang-kami>)[Hubungi Kami](http://freshfactory.id/</hubungi-kami>)
## Produk & Layanan Kami
Di gudang Fresh Factory barang Anda dapat disimpan di tempat penyimpanan barang zona beku, dingin, sejuk, maupun kering untuk kemudian dikemas dan dikirim untuk memenuhi pesanan pelanggan.
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/storage/product/new-title-15012023-054102.svg)
## Fulfillment
Gudang penyimpanan dengan zona beku, dingin, sejuk, kering, serta dikemas dan dikirim untuk memenuhi pesanan pelanggan.
[Lihat Detail ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/fulfillment>)
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/storage/product/new-title-15012023-054547.svg)
## Transport
Mengantarkan produk mulai dari tempat produksi, pusat pengiriman pesanan, gudang-gudang cabang, hingga tiba di tangan pelanggan.
[Lihat Detail ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/transport>)
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/storage/product/new-title-15012023-055753.svg)
## Enabler
Layanan lengkap untuk membantu bisnis Anda memulai penjualan di platform online dan e-commerce, dari konsultasi hingga pengiriman produk.
[Lihat Detail ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/enabler>)
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/storage/product/icon/processing-15012023-011400.svg)
## Processing
Fresh Factory akan membantu Anda dalam pengolahan bahan baku menjadi bahan yang siap untuk diolah lebih lanjut.
[Lihat Detail ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/processing>)
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/storage/product/icon/b2b-procurment-15012023-011550.svg)
## B2B Procurement
Fresh Factory menyediakan solusi e-procurement yang inovatif dan dapat diandalkan bagi korporasi.
[Lihat Detail ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/b2b-procurement>)
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/storage/product/icon/cross-border-15012023-011652.svg)
## Cross Border
Fresh Factory menyediakan layanan pengiriman internasional untuk produk Anda.
[Lihat Detail ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/cross-border>)
## Cara Kerja Kami
Kenali cara bagaimana kami membantu bisnis anda.
## Skema Harga
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/data/images/Bayar-Sesuai-Pemakaian.jpg)
## [Pilih Sesuai Pemakaian](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/fulfillment#pricelist>)
Pilih layanan penyimpanan, pengemasan, dan pengiriman yang sesuai dengan bisnis rantai dinginmu.
[Lihat Detail](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/fulfillment#pricelist>)
![Fulfillment](https://freshfactory.id/data/images/Pilih-Sesuai-Kebutuhan.jpg)
## [Pilih Sesuai Kebutuhan ](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/produk-layanan/fulfillment#pricelist>)
Fresh Factory memberikan solusi end-to-end dengan menyediakan custom fulfillment dan logistic untuk bisnis e-commerce dan retail. 
Hubungi Kami
![Snow](https://freshfactory.id/images/snow.svg)![Snow](https://freshfactory.id/images/snow.svg)
## Kembangkan Bisnismu Bersama Kami
Fresh Factory menyediakan solusi yang dapat membantu para pemilik bisnis untuk dapat melakukan bisnis onlinenya dengan mudah dan efisien.
[Daftar Sekarang](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/tenant.freshfactory.id/register>)
## Partner Kami
![Snow](https://freshfactory.id/images/snow.svg)![Snow](https://freshfactory.id/images/snow.svg)
## KembangkanBisnismu Sekarang
[Daftar Sekarang](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/tenant.freshfactory.id/register>)
## Artikel
[Lihat Semua Berita](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/berita>)
[![Fresh Factory](https://freshfactory.id/images/logo-ff.svg)](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/>)
### Perusahaan

  * [Karir](http://freshfactory.id/<https:/freshfactory.id/karir>)


### Help Center

generated_description:
### Fresh Factory Overview

**Fresh Factory** is a Jakarta-based startup founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch. The company positions itself as a **Smart Cold Chain Fulfillment Platform**, transforming how businesses handle the eCommerce and direct-to-retail fulfillment of cold chain products.

#### Mission and Vision
The mission is straightforward: to streamline the storage, picking, packing, and delivery processes for cold chain products. Fresh Factory achieves this by establishing a network of hyperlocal cold chain fulfillment centers equipped with a smart management system, allowing businesses to serve their customers faster and more efficiently.

#### Key Offerings
Fresh Factory provides a broad range of services tailored for B2B logistics needs, including:

- **Fulfillment**: Storage solutions for frozen, chilled, fresh, and dry goods, ready for packing and shipping.
- **Transport**: Reliable transit services that ensure products reach customers from production sites or fulfillment centers.
- **Processing**: Helping businesses convert raw materials into market-ready products.
- **B2B Procurement**: Innovative e-procurement solutions for corporate clients.
- **Cross Border**: International shipping options for products.

Their platform caters to both small and medium enterprises (SMEs) as well as larger corporations, showcasing a versatility designed to meet diverse client needs.

#### Team and Leadership
The company comprises a team of around 100 dedicated employees, with **Gustaf Alstromer** serving as a group partner, bringing valuable experience from his tenure in tech startups.

#### Why It Matters
In an increasingly eCommerce-driven world, efficient logistics is crucial, especially for perishable goods. Fresh Factory taps into this necessity by enhancing the existing logistics infrastructure in Indonesia, making it easier for businesses to thrive and for consumers to enjoy fresher products.

For more information, you can visit their website: [Fresh Factory](http://freshfactory.id/). 

Overall, Fresh Factory is not just about moving goodsâ€”it's about redefining the logistics of freshness in the digital age. If you're looking to expand your business efficiently in Indonesia's cold chain sector, teaming up with Fresh Factory may just be your best option.
